Text:

I have the same problem. It installs fine but the crack doesn't work, I get the sqlite3.dll isn't installed error.
you just need to replace the crack .exe file the one that is on your program files and it will work

Thanks a bunch!

It works like a charm,,
the .rar contains 2 things-- the original installer and a folder titled Crack.exe

after installing--
1) go Computer>Program Files>Any Video Converter
2) delete the VideoConvPro.exe in this folder. 
3) right click the VideoConvPro.exe located in folder Crack.exe mentioned above & press 'copy'
4) go Computer>Program Files>AVC again, 'paste'

aand youre good to go
